PRQL/prql

SQL replacement language for transforming and querying data with pipelines

Related repos

  • Builds data pipelines from a single SQL script
  • Framework for large-scale text-to-SQL data synthesis
  • SQL query engine for files, databases, apps, LLMs
  • Universal command-line interface for SQL databases
  • Data transformation framework for SQL and Python
  • command line tool for querying and transforming SQL, CSV, and Excel data
  • Blends SQL with LLMs for data queries
  • natural language to SQL engine for querying databases
